snippet.title: Acid Spy - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Acid Spy is a stealth action game with a cyberpunk theme and gameplay focused on killing in motion. Master the art of stealth and strike with swift and deadly precision. Everything from level design to reload mechanics have been implemented to let player skill be the limiting factor. There is no need to stop - every action follows naturally from the previous one.

Website: www.acidspy.com
Soundtrack: Wolf and Raven - A New Dawn
